PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_DamperOccurrence
PropertySetDef.Definition: Damper occurrence attributes attached to an instance of IfcDamper

PropertyDef.Name: SizingMethod
PropertyDef.Definition: Identifies whether the damper is sized nominally or with exact measurements:\X\0D \X\0D NOMINAL: Nominal sizing method. \X\0D EXACT: Exact sizing method.
